title: Unable to reset password
description: Customer is unable to reset their password using the forgot password link. They report that no email is being received even after multiple attempts.
resolution: Issue was caused by email filters. Customer was advised to check spam folder and add our domain to safe sender list. Password reset completed successfully.

title: Product sync failing between systems
description: Our e-commerce platform is not syncing product inventory with the warehouse management system. This is causing overselling issues.

updates.note: Engineering team identified API rate limiting as potential cause
Implementing retry logic with exponential backoff

title: Dashboard loading slowly
description: The analytics dashboard is taking 30+ seconds to load. This is affecting daily reporting workflows.
resolution: Optimized database queries and implemented caching. Dashboard now loads in under 3 seconds.

title: Mobile app crashes on iOS 17
description: Multiple users reporting app crashes when trying to upload photos on iOS 17 devices. Crash occurs immediately after photo selection.

title: Payment processing delays
description: Customers reporting that credit card payments are taking 24-48 hours to process instead of the usual instant processing.
